    • beforeTryBlock

      public static org.hibernate.Session beforeTryBlock()
      Internal method to create a new session or get an already-existing one before the 'try' block of every method that queries the database

    • catchBlock

      public static org.hibernate.Transaction catchBlock​(org.hibernate.HibernateException e)
      Internal method to roll back the transaction in the 'catch' block of every method that queries the database
      Parameters:
      e - HibernateException that is thrown if the try block in the query method fails
      Returns:
      Transaction object for testing purposes

    • finallyBlock

      public static org.hibernate.Session finallyBlock()
      Internal method to close the session in the 'finally' block of every method that queries the database
      Returns:
      Session object for testing purposes

    • get

      public static java.lang.Object get​(java.lang.Class<?> classWanted, long id) throws java.lang.Exception
      Query to get/fetch/retrieve an object from the database
      Parameters:
      classWanted - of the object to be fetched
      id - of the object to be fetched
      Returns:
      the object being fetched, to be cast non-dynamically
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - "Could not get the object from the database."

      public static boolean save​(java.lang.Object object) throws java.lang.Exception

      Parameters:
      object - to be stored
      Returns:
      true if successful
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - "Could not save the object to the database."
